section.p: (ZEN-23802) A new install of the ISO appliance does not have the same kernel version as the OVA appliance. For a new install of the ISO appliance, you need to perform the following command as a root user to get the latest kernel version: yum update or yum update kernel

(ZEN-15907) The size of the CentralQuery maximum memory allocation pool is set by the RAMCommitment variable in the CentralQuery service definition. The default value is 1024MB. Do not change the value to anything less than 1024MB.
